Queues¶

This module implements a basic FIFO queue which allows messages to be simultaneously dispatched to the same device by EMERGENT without risking message overlap on the actual device.

class fifo.FIFO¶

Bases: queue.Queue

Implements a threaded queue which continuously executes commands in a FIFO order.

__init__()¶

Initialize self. See help(type(self)) for accurate signature.

add(func, ID, *args, **kwargs)¶

Adds a function with optional positional and keyword arguments to the queue.

next()¶

Retrieves and executes the next function on a FIFO basis.

run(stopped)¶

Continuously retrieve and execute the next task.

class fifo.Message(ID, *args, **kwargs)¶

Bases: object

Container for queue message-passing

__init__(ID, *args, **kwargs)¶

Initialize self. See help(type(self)) for accurate signature.
